```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


Users can run AtacAnnoR step by step to see how AtacAnnoR works and modify parameters to annotate scATAC-seq cells better.

Many build-in functions could be used to check the performance of AtacAnnoR, which could be called by AtacAnnoR:::function_name()

----

## Load required packages and datasets

```{r, echo = T,fig.height=6, fig.width=12}
library(AtacAnnoR)
library(Seurat)
SeuratObj_RNA <- readRDS('~/txmdata/scATAC_seq/AtacAnnoR/data/10X-Multiome/SeuratObj/SeuratObj_RNA.RDS')    # reference
DimPlot(SeuratObj_RNA,group.by = 'true',label = T) + NoLegend() | 
  DimPlot(SeuratObj_RNA,group.by = 'true',label = T) + NoLegend()

```
